title: mid_morning_temperature_humidity_record
summary: Temperature and humidity measurement during mid-morning as ambient air becomes warmer.
description: This record captures ambient temperature and humidity measured on a house balcony wall using a digital thermometer-hygrometer (HTC-1). The measurement reflects warming conditions during late morning compared to earlier morning readings.

linked_references.note: Earlier morning temperature and humidity record.
Duck coop temperature record for environmental comparison.

external_reference.note: Image shows digital thermometer-hygrometer mounted on balcony wall.
